meanings.definition: Involving a violation of accepted or imposed boundaries or norms.
meanings.sent1: The artist's transgressive behavior shocked the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her transgressive attitude towards authority often got her into trouble.
meanings.sent3: The transgressive squirrel stole all the nuts from the other animals.
meanings.sent4: His transgressive fashion choices turned heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The transgressive graffiti on the wall made a bold statement.

meanings.definition: Tending to go beyond acceptable limits or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The movie's transgressive themes challenged societal norms.
meanings.sent2: Their transgressive actions pushed the boundaries of what was considered appropriate.
meanings.sent3: The transgressive puppy kept escaping from the yard to explore the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The transgressive storm flooded the streets with unexpected intensity.
meanings.sent5: Her transgressive dance moves captivated the audience with their daring nature.
